name: Marathon Oil Corporation
description: Marathon is an independent exploration and production company primarily focusing on unconventional resources in the United States. At the end of 2021, the company reported net proved reserves of 1.1 billion barrels of oil equivalent. Net production averaged 347 thousand barrels of oil equivalent per day in 2021 at a ratio of 70% oil and NGLs and 31% natural gas.
